title: Crack In The Road Exclusive Mixtape #9: Bravestation
body:
**[Headline Photo Credit](http://www.flickr.com/photos/mundomudo/)**

**Bravestation** first entered our radar when they were announced to perform at Newcastle and Gateshead’s **Evolution Festival**. Hailing from Canada, this four piece have been causing a stir on both sides of the Atlantic with their debut self titled EP, which you can hear over on their **[Bandcamp](http://bravestation.bandcamp.com/album/ep).** Driven melodic indie pop with a stunning level of complexity, **Bravestation**‘s sound has been compared to the likes of **Foals**, **Yeasayer**, and **Wolf Parade** (who feature on the band’s mix!).

With an upcoming UK tour in May, you have no excuse not to catch this fantastic band live. And if you’re still unsure, the band’s **Exclusive Mix** is an amazing insight into the band’s influences and inspirations!

[Bravestation – Crack In The Road Exclusive Mix](http://www.mixcloud.com/bencrackintheroad/bravestation-crack-in-the-road-exclusive-mix/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=cloudcast_link) by [Bencrackintheroad](http://www.mixcloud.com/bencrackintheroad/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=profile_link) on [Mixcloud](http://www.mixcloud.com/?utm_source=widget&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=base_links&utm_term=homepage_link)
